about_the_game:
This demo version works just like a shorter version of the full game.
  • In terms of story, it covers a day in the life of Courage until she finally decides to go to our world, Virtuanland. It's a good way to feel the premise of the story
  • It covers 2 of the 4 minigames ("Talk to all" and "Choose correct thoughts" are not included until later in the game) found on the full game
  • You can make 2 (or 3, depending on your choices) of the main game's big decisions
  • You'll get to meet 5 of the main characters and will have an idea of what should Courage do to complete her mission
  • You'll help your first virtuan (even though he's not technically a virtuan. You'll see xD)
  • All your progress can be transferred to the full game
